description: Supports any skill that has a duration, or can hit enemies to inflict ailments on them.

mods.text: Supported Skills deal % increased Damage over Time
Supported Skills have +% to Damage over Time Multiplier

mods: Supported Skills deal (45–49)% more Damage over Time
25% reduced Duration of Supported Skills and Damaging Ailments they inflict
name: Awakened Swift Affliction Support
